name: SupportBoneBoyAndDoggo
_source: speak;BoneBoy;You know, I've been watching you during battles.|You're quite the fearsome fighter for a dog.
speak;BoneBoy;I've been trying to remember...|Was I ever good with animals? In my past life, I mean.
speak;BoneBoy;*sighs*|It's frustrating, you know? Not remembering anything.|Just waking up one day as...this.
speak;BoneBoy;Heh, at least you're a good listener.|Better than most of the living folks around here.
speak;BoneBoy;Say, {v:DoggoName}...|Do you think you could help me with something?
speak;BoneBoy;I found this old bone while we were marching.|I thought maybe you could...|Tell me if it's human?
speak;BoneBoy;I know it's a strange request, but...|I can't help but wonder if it might be a clue.|About who I was.
speak;BoneBoy;You'll help?|Great!|Just...don't chew on it, okay?|It might be a distant relative.
speak;BoneBoy;That was a joke.|Hard to tell with this face, isn't it?
speak;BoneBoy;Ha ha!|I think we're going to get along just fine, {v:DoggoName}.
speak;BoneBoy;You want me to follow you?|Lead the way then.
speak;BoneBoy;A hole in the ground?|What am I supposed to be looking at?
speak;BoneBoy;Wait, is that...|Look at that, it's a skull!
speak;BoneBoy;You...dug this up for me, didn't you?|Because of what I said about my past.
speak;BoneBoy;I don't know whether to be touched or horrified.|Hmmmm.....|It's very old. Ancient, even.
speak;BoneBoy;Not related to me, I think.|But... thank you. It's strange to say, but...|This is the nicest thing anyone's done for me since I...|Woke up.
speak;BoneBoy;You know what's funny?|I can't remember who I was, but I remember what dogs are.|I remember they're loyal.|Man's best friend and all that.
speak;BoneBoy;Even a hellhound like you has that same...spirit.|That loyalty.
speak;BoneBoy;You're a good boy, {v:DoggoName}.|Even if you do dig up graves for fun.
speak;BoneBoy;Ha ha!|Come on, let's keep looking.|Maybe we'll find more clues about both our pasts.
speak;BoneBoy;There you are.|I've been looking for you.|You disappeared from camp after that last battle.
speak;BoneBoy;Hey, easy now. I'm just trying to help.|That gash looks nasty.
speak;BoneBoy;Why didn't you go to the healers?|Were you...hiding it?
speak;BoneBoy;You know, I remembered something today.|During the battle.
speak;BoneBoy;I was a healer.|Not with magic, but...I knew herbs.|Medicine.|It came back to me when I saw that soldier bleeding.
speak;BoneBoy;I think I was a field medic, or something like it.|I've been collecting herbs since then.
speak;BoneBoy;Let me help you.|I may not remember everything, but my hands seem to remember this.
speak;BoneBoy;It's strange, isn't it?|A skeleton treating a hellhound's wounds.
speak;BoneBoy;I think...|I think I became a medic because I couldn't stand seeing others in pain.|Even now, without flesh or a beating heart...|That feeling remains.
speak;BoneBoy;There.|That should help it heal.|Thank you, {v:DoggoName}.
speak;BoneBoy;For helping me remember who I was.|Not my name or my face, but something more important.|My purpose.
speak;BoneBoy;Strange companions we make, you and I.|But I wouldn't have it any other way.|When this war is over...|Maybe we could continue our journey together?
speak;BoneBoy;Good.|It's settled then.|A skeleton and his hellhound, searching for answers.|Sounds like the beginning of a very strange tale.
